mapper.select:
SELECT a.id AS id, a.url AS url, a.request_content AS requestContent, a.response_content AS responseContent, a.create_date AS createDate, a.is_success AS isSuccess FROM sys_joint_log a
1=1
AND a.url LIKE concat('%',#{url},'%')
AND a.request_content LIKE concat('%',#{requestContent},'%')
AND a.response_content LIKE concat('%',#{responseContent},'%')
AND a.is_success =#{isSuccess}
ORDER BY a.create_date DESC
